content: the **diagonal lattice tunisian headband** is a beginner-friendly tunisian crochet project that does not require any special hooks your steel crochet hook will work perfectly with this pattern you can make a warm and soft head warmer for yourself and a matching one for your baby/child *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 8 0 mm crochet hook aran 4 medium yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used paintbox yarns wool mix aran feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** the pattern is available in the following sizes 0-3 months head measurement 13-15 3-6 months head measurement 15-17 6-12 months head measurement 16-18 toddler head measurement 18-19 child head measurement 19-20 5 teenager/small adult head measurement 20 5-23 medium adult head measurement 21-24 **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
